title: Worlds 2016 Login Theme - League of Legends Piano Cover

embed.description: I present to you my piano cover for the Worlds 2016 Login Screen theme music! (you know, the epic one that got played throughout Worlds, and people said was far better than Ignite) The piano cover isn't terribly difficult, though I kept making mistakes, which prevented me from releasing it earlier, along with my Zedd: Ignite piano cover.

body:
I present to you my piano cover for the Worlds 2016 Login Screen theme music!

I also have a piano cover for Zedd: Ignite, which I am releasing at the same time: https://youtu.be/l2sxdIir5Ag

replies.body: Sounds great! Keep that stuff up buddy :)

Thanks very much!
Ideally I would like to cover most songs Riot put out since they all sound so good.
